mapper.insert: insert into tooncomment values(commentseq_tooncomment.nextval, 1, '내id는과자', #{content}, commentseq_tooncomment.nextval, 0, 0, 0, sysdate ,0)
mapper.select: select * from tooncomment left join (select commentseq ,count(commentgood) as totalgood, count(commentbad) as totalbad from commentgoodbad group by commentseq) using(commentseq) where episodecode='1' order by (case when totalgood > 10 then 1 else 2 end), commentseq desc
